Content: *p71887a01632*16	  18	 lactic acid is formed in muscles and in sour milk.ch3ccohohho	lactic acid may be obtained from ethanal in the laboratory by the two‑step synthesis shown.ch3ccohohhoch3cohch3ccnohhstep 1hcn / cn–step 2hcl(aq)	*(a)	 explain why lactic acid formed in muscles is optically active while lactic acid obtained using the laboratory synthesis is not. you should define any terms you use.(6)
